author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-LaSalle Logiport REIT to acquire trust beneficial rights of properties for 15.05 bln yen
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - LaSalle Logiport REIT
* Says it plans to acquire trust beneficial rights of Tokyo-based real estate property and Osaka-based real estate property on March 5, at the price of 15.05 billion yen in total
* Says it plans to take out loans of 15.28 billion yen in total on March 5, to fund the acquisition
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/9K8nfk ; goo.gl/F4Uu7U
